name: Beanjeweled
description:
The Plot:
Bobu the Bean Farmer has hired a new intern, but left no instructions before he went to the moon! Help the intern with some gardening by matching beans in Hilumia, the fate of the farm lies in your hands!

Controls:
1. Click & Drag - Connect beans to match them for points
2. Middle Mouse Click - Make Golden Bean (Color Bomb)
3. Right Click - Package Bean (Adjacent Bomb)
4. Spacebar - Change music (Soundtrack generously shared by SireDontPlay and KikoMints, featured creatives in the garden)

There are a total of 9 levels built into this little game experience, while I am still working to reflect the bean progression on the panels, try them all today! This was a small community project done by me, to bring our first game experience to the Garden since it has never really been done before! Really hope to build more experiences for the 9 Lives Arcade in the future :>

A small garden project built and created by Kawpuccino.eth (Azuki #4730) Inspired by the Beanz collection, and the Checks movement in 2023.  The touch input may be slightly unstable, still a work in progress. This is a passion project that does not profit from its usage. No copyright infringement intended.

If you would like to buy me a coffee, feel free to mint an NFT from Manifold at  https://app.manifold.xyz/c/bean-proof-of-farming as a token of appreciation for playing the game!

For BEAN CHECK holders, you may also mint a limited edition CERTIFICATE OF ACHIEVEMENT as a Proficient Bean Farmer! Burn your tokens here:  https://app.manifold.xyz/br/bean-certificate
